sentences.en: A 90 - minute daytime snooze might help the most, the study finds.
sentences.cn: 研究发现,白天小睡90分钟对巩固记忆最有效.

sentences.en: A snooze because we can't take the main characters seriously.
sentences.cn: 打个盹,因为我们根本无法认真对待片中的主要角色.

sentences.en: And I took a snooze on the plane.
sentences.cn: 我在飞机上小睡了一会儿.

sentences.en: Dad is taking a snooze in the other room.
sentences.cn: 爸爸正在另外一间房间里打盹儿.

sentences.en: Dad was snoozing in his armchair.
I'm going to have a snooze after lunch.

sentences.cn: 如果你不注意, 就错过良机了.

sentences.en: If your partner doesn't mind, you can choose to snooze after sex.
sentences.cn: 如果你的伴侣不介意, 你可以选择在两性英语后睡觉.

sentences.en: Love is letting he take a snooze after dinner.
sentences.cn: 爱是让他在饭后小睡一下.

sentences.en: Oh well , might as well stay home and have a good snooze.
sentences.cn: 没办法了, 在家大睡一觉也好.

sentences.en: Physically and mentally, you lose when you don't snooze.
sentences.cn: 当你睡不着觉的时候, 你的肉体和精神都会蒙受损失.

sentences.en: Red is joined by HEYWOOD, SKEET, FLOYD, JIGGER, ERNIE, SNOOZE.
sentences.cn: 海沃德 、 斯基特 、 弗洛伊德 、 齐格尔 、 厄尼 、 斯诺与瑞德聚到了一起.

sentences.en: Uncharacteristically for Keegan, he decided to have a snooze.
sentences.cn: 基根决定打个盹儿，这在他来说可是比较少见的。

sentences.en: We Super stars of Snooze don't nap to replace lost shut - eye or for a shift.
sentences.cn: 们这些瞌睡超级明星,睡午觉并不是为了补上没睡的觉,或是为了上夜班.

sentences.en: Who doesn't crave a midday snooze now and then?
sentences.cn: 谁不渴望偶尔睡个午觉 呢 ?

sentences.en: You snooze, you lose. Next time you should pay closer attention.
sentences.cn: 一不留神就会错过良机. 下次多注意点吧.

trans.tran_en: to sleep lightly for a short time
